item.title: Site Development
item.description: Todo Optimize images (Convert to WebP) Reduce fonts file size Search without JS? (Maybe) Fix need to refresh to change comment theme Fix code copy button (29-09-2023) Images Optimization (28-09-2023) Search fix. Notes/Categories styling. Simplified featured.html. Add recent posts to home. Folder structure. (27-09-2023) Iosevka fonts added (d5519ca). Head title order. New front matter if comment:false disable giscus. Comment moved inside article. Seperator removed from navbar. Gallery added to navbar. avatar added in /about & styling change.

item.title: Git
item.description: Create a new repository on the command line echo "# Something" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git branch -M main git remote add origin https://github.com/[username]/[repo].git git push -u origin main Push an existing repository from the command line git remote add origin https://github.com/[username]/[repo].git git branch -M main git push -u origin main Common Problem Notes to troubleshoot Contributions not showing on profile Make sure your config is match

item.title: Arch Linux: Cleanup
item.description: Clean pkg cache List packages ls /var/cache/pacman/pkg/ | less Remove all pkg except those installed sudo pacman -Sc Remove all files sudo pacman -Scc Or with yay yay -Scc Remove unused packages List unused sudo pacman -Qtdq Remove unused sudo pacman -R $(pacman -Qtdq) Journal logs sudo journalctl --vacuum-time=2d This will remove log older than 2 days, you can change accordingly. Clear journal log older than x day/month/year sudo journalctl --vacuum-size=100M Restrict logs to a certain size Clean home cache cache is located in ~/.

item.title: Tools
item.description: Useful tools for Pentest | CTF Forensics Summary Title - tools name Description - what the tools for CTF - Usefulness for CTF Title Description CTF exiftool meta information reader/writer Clues / flags strings Useful for finding clues foremost Recover files based on their headers, footers, and internal data structures data carving steghide

item.title: links
item.description: Collection of links. Title Description GTFOBins A curated list of Unix binaries that can be exploited by an attacker to bypass local security restrictions CyberChef A s1imple, intuitive web app for carrying out all manner of “cyber” operations within a web browser. Payloads All The Things A list of useful payloads and bypass for Web Application Security and Pentest/CTF Books Title Description Anna’s Archive Non-profit, open-source search engine for “shadow libraries”.

item.title: Arch Linux Install (Hyprland)
item.description: Installation My arch linux installation. Archinstall [minimal]: Compositor : Hyprland Terminal : Kitty Bar/Dock : Ags (https://github.com/Aylur/ags) File-manager : Nautilus My dotfiles availabe on (github) **SOON yay Notes: Run as user NOT ROOT! git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/yay cd yay makepkg -si Packages FOR NVIDIA: hyprland-nvidia-git yay -S hyprland aylurs-gtk-shell polkit-gnome neovim viewnior \ pavucontrol sassc swww wl-clipboard wf-recorder brightnessctl \ hyprpicker slurp grimblast wayshot swappy nautilus nerdfonts Configuration Wrapping the launcher #!
